subject: Horses

Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: Even if Barbaro's fused lower hind leg can support a normal lifestyle, there is a chance that he will not be able to stand on his hind legs to breed.
snippet: Even if Barbaro's fused lower hind leg can support a normal lifestyle, there is a chance that he will not be able to stand on his hind legs to breed.
